awakenings.effect: After [debuffer] uses ultimate skill, can also activate [Enhanced Ultimate Skill] once within 5 seconds. When activating [Enhanced Ultimate Skill], critical hit damage increases by 20%
[Skills] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4
[Must Kill] and [Passive] level and level cap +4
[Enhanced Ultimate Skill] ignores targets 20% elemental resistance

effects: Attack power increased by 40%, When there is only one enemy on the field, ultimate skill damage increased by 40%
memoryCard.name: King's Sword

auto.description: Deals fire damage equal to 780% of Attack to enemy unit and applies [Mark]. When Merlin uses ultimate skill or attacks targets with [Mark], damage increases by 20%
auto.name: Magic Swordplay: Molten Core Burst

normal.description: Deals fire damage equal to 120% of Attack to enemy unit
normal.name: Flame Slash

passive.description: When ultimate skill critically hits, additionally deals Fire damage equal to 120% attack power
passive.name: Rune Oscillation

ultimate.description: Deals fire damage equal to 1080% of Attack to enemy unit. After [buffer] uses ultimate skill, can activate [Enhanced Ultimate Skill] once within 5 seconds. [Enhanced Ultimate Skill]: Deal 1200% attack power Fire damage to target enemy unit. When there is only one enemy unit on the field, damage is additionally increased by 30%
ultimate.name: Magic Swordplay: King's Sword

teamSkill.description: Self critical rate increased by 7.5%. At the start of battle, every 15% critical hit rate can increase own critical hit damage by 7.5%, maximum 6 times
teamSkill.name: Combination Skill
